mapper.sql: ID, STARNAME, MINSCORE, MAXSCORE, CREATEID, UPDATETIME, REMARKS, DELSTATUS
mapper.delete: update T_SQ_STARINFO set delstatus='0' where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert: insert into T_SQ_STARINFO (ID, STARNAME, MINSCORE, MAXSCORE, CREATEID, UPDATETIME, REMARKS, DELSTATUS) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{starname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minscore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxscore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, '1',#{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into T_SQ_STARINFO
ID,updatetime,delstatus,
STARNAME,
MINSCORE,
MAXSCORE,
REMARKS,
CREATEID,
s_sq_starinfo.nextval,sysdate,'10',
#{starname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{minscore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{maxscore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update T_SQ_STARINFO
STARNAME = #{starname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MINSCORE = #{minscore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAXSCORE = #{maxscore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATEID =#{createid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPDATETIME = sysdate,
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_SQ_STARINFO set STARNAME = #{starname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MINSCORE = #{minscore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MAXSCORE = #{maxscore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATEID = #{createid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATETIME = sysdate REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select a.ID, STARNAME, MINSCORE, MAXSCORE, b.username,UPDATETIME, REMARKS from T_SQ_STARINFO a ,t_sys_user b where a.delstatus=10 and a.createid=b.id
and (STARNAME like'%'||#{param.starname}||'%' or MINSCORE like'%'||#{param.starname}||'%' or REMARKS like'%'||#{param.starname}||'%')
select a.ID, STARNAME, MINSCORE, MAXSCORE, b.username,UPDATETIME, REMARKS from T_SQ_STARINFO a ,t_sys_user b where a.delstatus=10 and a.createid=b.id order by id
